summary:
Aesir\'s Sword Deadlier than Mehrunes Razor
Strike Your foes With Aesir\'s Sword !
descriptionHtml:
Hello, This is the First mod i\'ve ever made
and i\'m not very good, but Practise makes Perfect ! :)
----------------------------------------------------------------
Aesir\'s Sword:
Damage:35
Enchant: Mehrunes Razor Enchantment
Value: 10000
----------------------------------------------------------------
How to get the Sword:
Press the Key Above Tab
Type \'\' Help Aesir\'s 4 \'\' or \'\'Help Aesirs\'\'
and the sword code will come up then type \'\' Player.additem \'\'Code\'\' 1
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
I got Inspired Yesterday when i downloaded  Aesir Armor:
and i realized There was no Sword so today i maked the sword
Texture: Steel Sword 
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Future Plans:
Using one of JaySuS Swords if permission  
Custom Bow
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Credits to:
Omesean 
for making Aesir Armor mod
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Highly Recommended
Aesir Armor:http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35094//?
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
author: Leikaringen123
